quotes.quote: When two brothers are busy fighting, an evil man can easily attack and rob their poor mother. Mankind should always stay united, standing shoulder to shoulder so evil can never cheat and divide them.
The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
A good team needs three things: the right people, the right spirit, and a couple inside jokes.
Unity is strength. Synergy is might. Teamwork is power.
SynergyÂ isÂ theÂ creationÂ ofÂ aÂ wholeÂ thatÂ isÂ greaterÂ thanÂ theÂ sumÂ ofÂ its parts.
No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it.
The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
Coming together is a beginning.Â  Keeping together is progress.Â  Working together is success.
On our own, we are marshmallows and dried spaghetti, but together we can become something bigger.

The leaders who work most effectively, it seems to me, never says 'I'.Â  And that's not because they have trained themselves not to say 'I.'Â  They don't think 'I.'Â  They think 'we'; they think 'team.'Â  They understand their job is to make the team function.Â  They accept responsibility and don't sidestep it, but 'we' gets the credit....Â  This is what creates trust, what enables you to get the task done.

Your mind can be your enemy or friend. If you always follow your heart, your mind will feel neglected. If you follow only your mind, your heart will never forgive you. Never ignore your conscience, yet always be conscious of reason. Make your heart and mind friends and you will have peace of mind throughout life's seasons.
Nobody can achieve success alone.
Every successful start-up is built on four pillars. Team, Idea, Passion & Presentations.
There is no need to tell someone how to do his job if you have properly trained your team.
The individual great spirit and great efforts create a great team.
When mutual understanding and respect are present, the spirit of synergyÂ inevitableÂ starts to develop.
The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.Â  You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
The secret to success in business is synergy.
Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
Great teams do not hold back with one another.
Synergy is better than my way or your way. It's our way.
Teamwork builds trust and the trust build growth.
A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skill of the others.
An army is greater than a warrior.

We = power.
Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

Synergy is what happens when one plus one equals ten or a hundred or even a thousand! It's the profound result when two or more respectful human beings determine to go beyond their preconceived ideas to meet a great challenge.
Synergy - the bonus that is achieved when things work together harmoniously.
Teamwork is the secret that make common people achieve uncommon result.
